issue.title: [Plasma] Change Client Create and Get to use Buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

This is primarily preparation for ARROW-1394 for returning CudaBuffers, but also allows Arrow buffer tools to be used with Plasma.
